page.title: 16VILLAGE ACTIVITIES TYLERHILL
page.content: In the 1940s the village was given 5 acres of woodland. The land was cleared levelled and drained and sown with grass. It is now a fine open recreational area bounded by woodland. In 1981 money was raised to replace the small village hall with a large new brick-built hall. It was designed and built mainly by the villagers in their spare time. Here are some of the activities which take place there. Guides May Fayre Brownies Harvest Supper Jnr.Sports Club Raspberry Teas Gardening Club Over 60s Club Badminton Womens Institute Playgroup Football Mothers & Toddlers Group Cricket Flower Show & Summer Fete Fireworks Blean Hackington & Tyler Hill Society It is also let for wedding receptions, Yoga classes discos
